ca.teamTen.recitopia.models
Class Fridge

java.lang.Object
  ca.teamTen.recitopia.models.Fridge

public class Fridge
extends java.lang.Object

Fridge class stores a set of ingredients, loads/saves from a file. Duplicate ingredients are ignored.

Constructor Summary

          Create a new Fridge that doesn't save/load.s

          Build an empty fridge.
